title: Fix article submission on Admin page

requirements.summary: Fix the article submission flow so admins can successfully add new articles through the Admin page form
acceptanceCriteria: Admin can fill out the article submission form and click submit without encountering an error.
On successful submission, the new article appears in the article list on the Admin page.
Backend addArticle (or equivalent) function accepts the submitted data and stores it correctly.
Any validation errors in the form are surfaced clearly to the user.
No console errors or unhandled promise rejections occur during article submission.

file_operations.description: Fix the article submission form to correctly call the backend addNews function. Ensure all required parameters (id, title, summary, fullContent, category, author, publicationDate, imageUrl) match the backend interface signature. Add proper error handling for submission failures with clear user feedback. Verify form validation catches missing or invalid fields before submission. Ensure successful submission refreshes the article list and clears the form. Check that image upload handling correctly converts files to URLs or handles null values as expected by addNews.

Review and fix the addNews mutation hook to ensure it correctly invokes actor.addNews with all parameters in the right order and type. Verify the mutation invalidates the 'allNews' query key on success to trigger a refetch of the article list. Add proper error propagation so the AdminPage can display submission errors to the user. Ensure the mutation handles imageUrl as string | null to match the backend interface.
